item.title: Taiwan condemns Somalia travel ban
item.description: Taiwanese are warned against traveling to Somalia or Somaliland for their own safety before the ban is lifted.

item.title: Malta's golden passport scheme breaks EU law, top court rules
item.description: The scheme lets people become citizens after paying, buying or renting property of a certain value, and donating to charity.

item.title: Israeli forces arrest prominent Palestinian journalist in West Bank
item.description: Ali al-Samoudi, who has worked extensively with Western media, was detained during what the Israeli military said were counter-terrorism raids.

item.title: Toxic mushroom meal was 'terrible accident', says woman on trial for murder
item.description: Erin Patterson admits lying to police about her relatives' deaths, but will argue they were a "terrible accident".

item.title: Swedish police arrest teenager after fatal triple shooting
item.description: The arrest comes after three people, all reportedly under the age of 20, were shot dead in a hair salon.
